documentation

documentation(options)

Documentation stream intended for use within the gulp system.

Parameters

  • Object options :

    output options
    • string options.format

      either 'html', 'md', 'json', or 'docset'

    • string options.filename

      custom filename for md or json output

Returns

stream.Transform

Examples

var documentation = require('./'),
    gulp = require('gulp');

gulp.task('documentation', function () {
  gulp.src('./index.js')
    .pipe(documentation({
      format: 'html'
    }))
    .pipe(gulp.dest('documentation'));
});

// documentation with JSON output, default filename API.md
gulp.task('documentation-json', function () {
  gulp.src('./index.js')
    .pipe(documentation({
      format: 'json'
    }))
    .pipe(gulp.dest('documentation'));
});

// documentation with markdown output, default filename API.md
gulp.task('documentation-md', function () {
  gulp.src('./index.js')
    .pipe(documentation({
      format: 'md'
    }))
    .pipe(gulp.dest('documentation'));
});
